TestCaseMetaData.name: PT and INR Header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers a simple electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. The EHR-S receives and incorporates the messages, and creates and sends an acknowledgement message. The LIS system receives the acknowledgement message.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support minimally populated messages (single occurrences of all required ("R") elements).
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: The initial test plan is a "smoke test" to reveal simple failures severe enough to preclude further testing.
